document_data.name: The Turning
document_data.mainbody: The '''Turning''' was a religious event observed by worshipers of [[Ilmater]], the Lord on the Rack.
document_data.Description: This was the most important ritual within the [[Church of Ilmater]]. The Turning involved every member of Ilmater's clergy trying to get dying individuals to turn to Ilmater's worship before their death.
